item.title: McFly - All About You - Key of C
item.description:
All About You by McFly. It’s been digitally lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C Am F G E7 C7 D7 Fm G+
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Daniel Powter - Bad Day - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: C, Fadd2, G, Am, F, G+, D
So You Had A Bad Day by Daniel Powter. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. Also, the bridge has been removed to help simplify it. While I created this for ukulele, any instrument that plays chords would use it (guitar, keyboard, etc.).
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: The Traveling Wilburys - Handle With Care - Key of G
item.description: Chords: D, D7, G, C, Em, G+ Simple Strum: DU DU DU DU Other Strum: D- DU D- DU; D- DU -U DU

item.title: Los Panchos - Bésame Mucho - Key of Em
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Besame Mucho on the ukulele by Los Panchos. The chords used are Em Am E7 B A D C7 G G+ E6.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Bobby Helms - Jingle Bell Rock - Key of C
item.description:
For Educational Use. Best used with GCEA tuned ukuleles. Key of C. 13 chords (see video).
Chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com

item.title: Twenty One Pilots - The Judge - Key of C
Blackbird - The Beatles - Uke Play-Along - Key of G
item.description:
Not for the faint of heart. This is a tough one. Lots of interesting chords, which is unusual for my channel because I try to stay to about 6 basic chords. Chords are G, Am7, D, C, A7, D#dim, Em, G-aug, A9, Cm, D7, Gm7, Dm, F. Is that enough for ya? ;)
When there are single chords in a row...I'd suggest beginning by just doing one down strum for each chord (that will help you switch). When there is more than chord in a row, you might try a D- DU kind of shuffling strum. Once you've got the chords going, just listen to the recording and the strumming that feels good.
People requested a version of Blackbird that was slower to help them get up to speed for the original version. I created a version at 70% speed, 80% speed, and 90% speed.
Find the version of Blackbird at 70% tempo at https://youtu.be/KquusSdT6OE
Find the version of Blackbird at 80% tempo at https://youtu.be/EmEa-4NhP5I
Find the version of Blackbird at 90% tempo at https://youtu.be/b9Q5FzAy8fs
